channel.title: I need help with my runescape server
channel.description:
Alright, well i need help with the following things:
Order of running bats? Edit both client and gui or just client? what is the best Source+Client to use (From experience)?
Alright, so what i have been doing normally is just i edit client.java and sometimes i cant find the area to edit i search 'localhost' '127.0.0.1' 'no-ip' and sometimes if that does not work, i edit the GUI.java, then i will run the source and then run the client. and it will either give me an error on the bat or not run at all.
I have just been edidting the client.java but some of them i cant find the space to edit. so then i edit GUI.java
i want to find the best one that is currently working i dont care what build it is. thanks!

item.title: I need help with my runescape server
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

What I got from your question is that you want us to recommend you a source. Requests aren’t necessarily allowed, for future references.

Anyways, this is a personal opinion, you shouldn’t go with what everyone says. If you want a clean build try something like runesource or hyperion. If you’re competent I would suggest trying out apollo, but that’s going to be a lot of work. I’m personally using a heavily modified PI and I’m content with it.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with my runescape server
